channel.title: VPS, help me, please!
channel.description:
HI!
I got a serious problem than trying to start the server on VPS. Everything just looks fine: the java installed wihout errors, server is putted with WinSCP. here is my PROBLEM: [IMG]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/9543/helpax.jpg[/img]
Almost forgot to say, that I am using Debian-5.0. OS, The .Bat file is changed to .sh, but I dont know if its coverted correctly, so mine sh file: [code]#!/bin/sh java -Xmx1500m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server [/code]
Thank you.

HI!
